snippet: Gross domestic product rose only 0.6 percent in the third quarter in Brazil, recently viewed as the rising star among Latin America’s economies.
abstract: Brazil’s economy registers anemic growth in the third quarter as investment levels remained disappointingly low; results cast doubt on policies meant to prevent Brazil from turning into a laggard among Latin America’s economies.
lead_paragraph: Gross domestic product rose only 0.6 percent in the third quarter in Brazil, recently viewed as the rising star among Latin America’s economies.

headline.seo: Brazil Registers Anemic Growth in 3rd Quarter, Surprising Economists
headline.main: Brazil Registers Anemic Growth, Surprising Economists
headline.print_headline: Brazil Registers Anemic Growth, Surprising Economists
